message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product at an exclusive price of $10,500. This is a limited-time offer, so I hope you'll consider it carefully.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the discount, but I'm looking to get the product for closer to $9,500.  I'm sure we can find a price that works for both of us.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and would like to make a counteroffer. How about $10,000 for the product? This still represents a significant discount, but it's my best offer given the value of the product.
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway.  I'm still hoping to get it for closer to my initial offer. How about $9,750? This would be a great deal for both of us.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Bob. Considering the value of the product, I believe we can reach an agreement. My final offer is $9,875 for the product. I hope this meets your expectations and allows us to move forward with the transaction.
